text: AqdiqtyaM caqruM nirva#pEth saMgrAqma-mu#paprayAqsyanniqyaM ~MvA adi#tiraqsyAmEqva pUrvEq prati#tiShThanti vaiSvAnaqraM dvAda#SakapAlaqM nirva#pEdAqyata#naM gaqtvAsa#M~MvathsaqrO vA aqgni rvai$SvAnaqraH sa#M~MvathsaqraH Kaluq vai dEqvAnA#-mAqyata#namEqtasmAqdvA Aqyata#nAd-dEqvA asu#rAnajayaqnaq. yad-vai$SvAnaqraM dvAda#SakapAlaM niqrvapa#ti dEqvAnA#mEqvAyata#nE yatatEq jaya#tiq ta(gm) sa#grAMqmamEqtasmiqn vA Eqtau mRu#jAtEq - [  ]  30
